mapper.select: SELECT psf.SP_code , psf.sup_no , hs.sup_name, psf.pact_code , mf.pact_type_code, mf.pact_name, psf.sign_date, psf.party , psf.sp_money , psf.first_man , psf.second_man , psf.note, psf.reason , psf.depend, psf.state FROM PACT_SP_FKHT psf LEFT JOIN PACT_MAIN_FKHT mf ON psf.GROUP_ID = mf.GROUP_ID AND psf.HOS_ID = mf.HOS_ID AND psf.COPY_CODE = mf.COPY_CODE AND psf.PACT_CODE = mf.PACT_CODE LEFT JOIN HOS_SUP hs ON hs.GROUP_ID = psf.GROUP_ID AND hs.HOS_ID = psf.HOS_ID AND hs.SUP_ID = psf.SUP_NO WHERE psf.group_id=#{group_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and psf.hos_id=#{hos_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and psf.copy_code=#{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and psf.sp_code = #{sp_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and psf.pact_code = #{pact_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PACT_SP_FKHT ( group_id , hos_id , copy_code , sp_code, pact_code , sign_date , sup_id , sup_no , first_man , second_man , party , sp_money , note , depend , reason , state , maker , make_date , checker , check_date , confirmer , confirm_date ) VALUES( #{group_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{hos_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sp_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pact_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_timestamp(#{sign_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-mm--dd hh24:mi:ss.ff'), #{sup_id,jdbcType= NUMERIC}, #{sup_no,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{first_man,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{second_man,jdbcType= VARCHAR}, #{party,jdbcType= VARCHAR}, #{sp_money,jdbcType= NUMERIC}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depend,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maker,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, to_timestamp(#{make_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-mm--dd hh24:mi:ss.ff'), #{checker,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{check_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{confirmer,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{confirm_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
